Document.summary: A file stream. It is readable when you use [F:vl.stream.FileStream.AccessRight.ReadOnly] or [F:vl.stream.FileStream.AccessRight.ReadWrite] to create the stream. It is writable when you use [F:vl.stream.FileStream.AccessRight.WriteOnly] or [F:vl.stream.FileStream.AccessRight.ReadWrite] to create the stream.
